column5: Its that time Hey Guys,  The weather is slowly starting to cooperate with us. Lifts will begin this Friday April 1st at the Streetsville fish way and will continue on until the 15th of April every night at 5pm. Unless the forecast changes. We will update weather changes on the Craa website www.craa.on.ca Please no vehicles at the ladder all parking is to be on Drenkelly and proceeed to walk down as a group, the gated will close once we begin and entrance to the ladder will not be possible so please show up prior to 5 pm daily Due to restrictions from the land Owner ( kraft Canada) No children under 16 are permitted  It should be a record year, and we anticipate breaking our nightly record Give back to the resource come help   Milo
Should I bring baitcaster or spinning?
Hey all Due to weather lits have been cancelled for tommorrow, we are thinking the weekend and will advise
I need some volunteer hours for school, so I may help out this weekend.  On average, how many hours will it take to lift them over each night?   Thanks!
the one at Port Hope seems a bit far BUT THIS 1 IS GOOD FOR ME =]
Tibbs thats a tough one to answer, are you over 16 yrs old
Yep, but I can't make it this weekend.  However, I'll try to make it some other time.
any news yet ??  intrested in helping out if i can.  pm  me  im good for sunday aft /mon tues..
